item.title: This Simple Trick Will Help You Instantly Turn Off SOS On Your iPhone 12 Pro Max!
item.description: Introduction: What is SOS and why it is important to turn it off on the iPhone 12 Pro Max The iPhone 12 Pro Max has a feature called Emergency SOS, or SOS for short. It is designed to help you quickly and easily call for help in an emergency. You can activate it by pressing the power button five times in rapid succession. However, this feature can be a bit of a nuisance if it is activated accidentally, so it is important to know how to turn it off.
